question: Which type of tree is dominant in temperate forests?

nodes.text: Vines are not the dominant type of tree in temperate forests.
Fungus is not the dominant type of tree in temperate forests.
Shrubs are not the dominant type of tree in temperate forests.
Deciduous trees are dominant in temperate forests.
